div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
septimo die mensis februarij Anno quosupra

The said day the baillies assignit the thrid day of marche to alexander
thomsone litstar to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be gilbert litster
for the wrangwis' opnyng of his bak wyndois and litting of tua pecis
of blew claitht ilkane contening tua elnis and demi and Johnne the Waus
come Souerte be his hand to entir the said alexander the said day befor
the baillies

The said day patrik chernside oblist him be his hand vphaldin to freitht
ande kep alexander King skathles ande free of ale annuell Rentis
that may be clamyt of his Inland bocht fra Dauid mar at the handis
of the lard of barnis and ser mastir James strachin and ale vtheris
quhome It efferis Ande Dauid mar oblist him to freitht the said patrik

The said day Johne fechat grantit that he had takin ane hous'
in futy fra Dauid tailyeour for ane merk of siluer of maile quhilkis
the baillies chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day the baillies assignit mononday that nixt cumis to the
Relict of vmquhill thome leiche to preve quhat gudis that Johnne fechat
Intromettit with of hirris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxo die februarij
anno quo Supra

The said' day the baillies assignit friday the thrid' day of merche next to cum
to the relict of thome leche to preiwe quhat gudis Johne fechat Intermettit
with of hirris

The said' day sere Androw Colison procurator to mastir Dauy menyes grantit
to supersede the xv s' of annuell to the tennentis of begybuchin
land' quhil pasche that nixt Cumis Ande Johne fechat Oblist him to
freithe the said' tennentis of the saide xv s'

The said day Johne Steuinsone one that ane part Ande cristy prat
Symmer' one that vthir part oblist thame fathtfullie to stande
and abid' at the deliuerance of Duncan Colisone forspekar of the
assis' anent the clame of certane Siluir debatabile betuis tham
and the balyeis ordanit William scrimgeor' officiar' to warne
the said' Duncan to comper one friday the thrid' day of marche
to gifffurtht his deliuerance in the said matir

The said day Alexander King oblist him his ayris and Assignez'
be the fathtis of thar' bodiis possessoris of the Inlande
liande in the gastraw betuix the lande of Johne Knollis
one the Southt part Ande the lande of vmquhile Jofray burnat
one the northt part to Dauy mar' Sone and ayr' to vmquhill
thomas mar' to pay yerlie fyve pennis to the kingis maile
out of his saide Inlande / and freithe and keipe the forlande
of the saide tenement yerlie and termlie of the saide malis of
fiwe pennis

Eodem die Johannes blitht conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Richardi Waus senioris
pro perturbio thome towy prestigiam ad fenistram sua et Cuj emendabit in Jura volunt
et Idem thomas quitus de perturbio prefati Johannis

Eodem die Robertus coutis conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore Ricardi Waus senioris prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis blitht Cuj emendabit in Jura volunt Et Idem Johannes conuictus
pro perturbio ipsius Roberti Cuj emendabit ut volunt Jura Infra dictus Johannes Robertus conuictus
fuit pro perturbio vxoris ipsius Johannis Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Duncanus Symsone piscator conuictus per dictam assisam pro perturbio Roberti coutis
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et Idem Robertus quitus de perturbio ipsius Duncanj

Eodem die Alexander chamer deuenit plegius legalis quod thomas towy / Andreas Johnesone Robertus coutis
Andreas gray / Alexander Sellar' et Willelmus Wallace erunt Indempnes pro Johanne matheson' aliter
quam per viam Juris et Idem Johanes obligauit se ad conseruandum suum plegium indempnem de huismodi
fideiussione Et dictus Johannes mathesone deuenit plegius legalis quod debet thomas Andreas Robertus
Andreas Alexander et Willelmus erunt Indempnes pro Duncano Symsone et thoma bryane
aliter quam per viam Juris / et Idem d thomas bryane deuenit plegius legalis quod debet famuli
thome towy et ipse thomas erunt Indempnes pro dicto Johanne blitht aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die thomas chipman deuenit plegius legalis quos debet Johannes et sui famuli prenotati
erunt Indempnes pro thoma towy Alexandro Sellar' thoma pipar et Willelmo Wallace aliter quam
per viam Juris
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die februarij anno quo Supra

The saide day It was Sufficientlie previt that the broune hors' debatabile betuix
Johane home and Androw murray in Drumblat was he saide Johnis quhilk he deliuerit
to the saide Androw for the pament of the Siluir that was aving for the saide hors'
Apone the quhilkis george bisset askit actis and Instrumentis at me sere Johane Stirveling
befor thir witnes Johne mar' balye mastir James strachin mathow branche Johne
ratre and Williame scrimgeor' sergeand'

The said' day george bisset offerit him redy present and to Remane that day and
to morne to the Resaving of the money promittit to him be the executoris of vmquhill
thomas prat for his wiffis airschip and extending to

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die marcij

head.add: Anent the Skippar In the saling of the merchantis

div.p:
The said' day the aldirman In the tovnis nayme chargit Johne
michaelsone Skippar' that he Resaue nayne nichtbour'
of the tone within his Schip for the gude of merchandice
vndir the pane of tene li' excepand' thame of the quhilkis
the names salbe gevin to him in bill quhilkis ar' licenceit
be the aldirman and Consale

The saide day Alexander coupar grantit he ehde ane Siluire
spvne of Johne of mydiltonis' in wede of xiiij d'
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to deliuir to the saide Johne
within terme of law and Androw Waus grantit he hed' ther saide spvn'
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to deliuir to the saide Alexander
within terme of law and the saide Androw laid' the saide Spvne
in wede to thomas Waus and the balyeis chargit the said'
thomas to deliuir the saide Spvne within terme of law
to the saide Androw he payand' him samekile' as he cane
prewe It aving to him

Quarto die marcij anno Domini Mo quinquagesimo
secundo

add.foreign: Introitus gilberti menyeis in Officium communis Scribe huius burgi

div.p:
The ferde day of the montetht of merche the yer' of gode IM fiwe hundretht
and tua yeris the aldirman ballieis Consale and Communite of Abirdene
Warnit be the hand bell throw the hal tone gathtreit and personalie present
within the tolbutht of the Samyn ande Circualie Inquierit Ilkane
be thame Selff be thomas leslie balye and Williame scrimgeor' sergeand'
ale in ane vote concordand' nayne Sayand' in the Contrar' riplie
avisit thar' vtilite seyne and considerit for Resonabill caus' concerning tham
Ande specialy for the Some of fourty markis propinit and gevin to the
common profit and vys' of the said' burghe gravntit and gaf
thar office of commone clerkschip to gilbert menyeis for ale
the dais of his liwe vacande be decess' of vmquhile William'
chamer last possessor of the Samyn being at thar disposicioun
with ale and Sindrie fredomes Commoditeis asiamentis and profitis Ande
with the perpetuale and annual porcioun of tuelff markis ande
wirh ale vthir deuyteis and vsuale consuetudinis pertening to the saide
office or ony wyss' may pertene tharto als' frelie quietlie wale
and pece in ale thingis and be aw thingis as ony of his prede
cessoris Josit or brukit the said' office ony tymes bigane
et cetera The saide gilbert or his substitutis or deputis ane or
may doing and excerceing the said' office of commone clerk
schipe deulie as efferis / alanerlie to the quhilkis the saide
gilbert war Suorne the gret bodely aithe And' Incontinent
thareftir the said gilbert with express' Consent and assent of the aldirman
balyeis Counsale and Communite of the saide burghe ale in ane vote concordande
maid' constituit and ordanit sere Johne Stirueling notar publicis Dauid liell his
Cosin and vthiris seruitoris and writaris to the saide sere Johne his deputis and substitutis
Clerkis of the said' bughe coniunctle and Seueralie gevande and grantand to the
saide sere Johne and Dauid and vthir writaris being with him for the tyme his
fule fre laychfule and plane pouer expres' mandment' and charge tile excerce
do and vys' the said' Office of Clerkschipe for ale the dais of the said sere
Jonhes' lywe the saide sere Johne vndirliing the dew seruice of the samyn
as efferis siclik as his predecessoris has done tymes bigane Ande keping'
the bukis concerning the saide Office Ande atour the saide gilbert presentit the
saide sere Johne and Dauid to the saidez aldirman balyeis Counsale and communite quhilkis
thai resauit admittit and entirit lauchfullie to the said' office for ale the dais
of his liwe Ande the saide sere Johne and Dauid was suorne the gret aitht'
tile excers' the said' Office lelelie and treulie but fraude or gile Ande subscriuit
with the handis of the said' notar for the graunt of the tone to the said' gilbert
And' with the hande of the said' gilbert for witnesing of his substitutioun
Nocht withstanding the said sere Johne and his substitutis ar' dischargit at
the wile of the said' gilbert of the said' Office thai being thrys' conuict'
for non dew seruic' and excerceing of the said' Office
Gilbert menyis
Manu propria
Johannes Stirueling Notaris
Manu propria et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die
marcij anno quo Supra

The said' day It was fundin be ane Suorne assis' Androw
Cullane forspeakr that Jonhne gregory is avand' to Johne of
balcromy viij s' and ij d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to
pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
octauo die mensis marcij anno quo supra

The said' day Jonhne fechat was in ane Amerciament of the
court be his avne toung gravnt for the strubulance
and deforceing of gilbert prestone sergeande in
the execucione' of his office Ande to Amende as
law will and forbeir' in tyme to Cum

The saide day the balyeis ordanit Androw nachty
officiar' to distres' Williame belty for xiiij s' for
the quhilkis he come Souerte to Jonhne of that for
ane landmane and mak the saide Johne be pait tharof

head.add: Dauid theman Alexander coupar and Willelmus smytht

div.p:
The saide day Alexander coupar Come Souerte be his hande vphaldin to
pay to Dauid theman or tile ony procurator of Sanctis elegeous'
altar of Abirdene tuentj fiwe s' at Saint sernanis day next to cum
for William Smitht and the said' William Oblist him be his hand to freithe'
the said' Alexander tharof Ande assignit him his Stedy frelie to the pament of
the saide money to be tane at his avne hande

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio decimo die
mensis marcij Anno domini Millesimo quinquagesimo secundo quo supra

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de Abirdene coram honorabilibus viris Alexandro menyeis
preposito thoma leslie Johanne mar Jacobo Colisone et Dauid mar ballivis dicti burgi In pretorio
eiusdem pro tribunali sedenti decimo die mensis marcij anno Domini Millesimo quinquagesimo
secundo per subscriptum videlicet Robertum blinsele Alexndrum rede Dauid menyeis Alexandrum thome
gilbertum menyeis Andream Cullane Johannem Retre patricium rede thomam Waus Johannem
Stevinsone Richard' ruthirfurde Johannem auchneywe Malcomum crag Willelmum
Kintor et Dauid fynne burgenses dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus
young auunculus domini Johannis malisone latoris presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus vt
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra cum pertinentibus Jacente
infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam
gilberti leche ex australi ex vna et terram magistri Alexandri Cullane ex boriali
partibus ad altera et communem viam Regiam versus Occidens Et quod dictus dominus
Johannes est legitimis et propinquior heredis dicti quondam Wilellmi auunculi suj de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis Et quos est legitime etatis Et quod dictam terram valet nunc per
annum quatuor marcas et valuit duas marcas tempore pacis Et quos tenetur in capite
de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis
per decessum quondam dicti Wilellmj per Spacium duorum mensium aut eocirca in defectu
virj heredis Jus suum huiusque nomine prosequentis data et clausa sub Sigillo dicti
thome leslie balliuj et Sigillis quorundam qui huic Inquisicioni Intererant
facienum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The saide day Alexander king was quyt of ale clamys of the Somez aving
be him to Dauid mar' for the lande bocht fra him except' thre franche
crovne promittit to him for his peroffering of the forland'

The saide day thomas leslie grantit him Souerte to thome straloche
for ij bollis of quhet for Williame Watson mathousone in Curtastone
to be pait be pasche next hereftir

The said day Robert blinsall Alexander Red Alexander Chamer Androw Cullane Alexander
gray Williame futhes and Androw murray was chosine be the counsall to
heir' se consider vndirstande and conclude the expensis maide be Alexander menyeis
aldirman and Johne' of mar bailye pasand in the townys erandis via Sindrie tymis
xli dais gangand and cumande and the saide personis deponit the gret aitht to ende the said
Countis ande the Countis of the denis of the gilde of the yer' bigane and allowe ande
disallowe eftir thar quitclame excep the saides Willime futhes and Androw murray
quhilkis was nocht presentand' for to

The said' day In presence of Johne mar' ane of the balyeis Alexander chavmer assignit
to gilbert menyeis his sone the fisching aving to him be vmquhile William
of chamer his brothir and his Spous' for his half nethis fischingis of the Raik
extending to xj barellis of Salmond' tharof x barrellis of this yeris fischingis
Instan' and j barrell of the yer' last bigane he payand' to his saide Spous'
the money Resavit be him extending to Ande gif the
said' gilbert may Recouir the said' half nethis fischingis of the Raik fra hir'
he assignit him the Samyn'

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eisudem xiij die marcij
anno quo supra

The saide day Dauy mar yongir grantit to deliuir to georgis smyth that lokis
and the workin lumys that he hade takin of his he payande to the said Dauid ij s'

The said day Dauy mar was conuykit fr be ane suorne assis' for the dome'
takin of ane Closat within alexander Kingis lande be the mowtht of patry
leslie forspekar' for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and to
amend' as lawe will and to forber in tyme to cum and atour' It was deliuerit
be the said assis' that the saide Dauid sall dewide and Red the lande that he duellis
in Incontinent till Alexander King

The saide day Alexander burnat oblist him to deliuir to Johne arthour xvij
s' betuix this and the day aucht dais Ande failyeing to bring' his brodir strenyabill
to pay the said Some at the said day

Eodem die agnes stiklar' conuicta fuit per dictam assisam ex ore patricie leslie prelocutor
eiusdem pro perturbio presentorum Andree body pro quibus emendabit vt Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

The saide day huchone' Wellis grantit to gar Willuiam Wormet be payt of
futheris of pettis orellis pat the sammyne within terme of lawe

The said' day the aldirman and baillies for commons wele of the tone
Statut' ordanit and chargit that nay flessar' within this burghe' suld'
brak ony Salmon keling turbut or vthir gret lyne fische except'
thame being bocht be the nichtbouris and Induellaris of the tone vndir
the payne of viij s' vnforgevin' to the quhilkis the flessaris present consentit

Curia balliuorum de Aberdenne' tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
die mensis marcij Anno Domini millesimo quinquagesimo secundo

Eodem die margareta Chamer filia quondam thome Chamer fecit constituit
creaui et nominauit georgium bisset suum procuratorem ad petendum omnia bona
sibi Jure hereditario contingenti Racione decessus quondam Willelmi de camera patrij
suj eadem recipiendum et inde acquitandum Et ad requirendum balliuos dictj
burgi secum accederit ad quandam terram Jacente infra dictum burgum prefato
Willelmo pertinenti ad videndum ipsum procuratorem quo supra ad annullandum et cassandum
quandam sasinam de eadem aliis Waltero chamer tradtt' traditerunt ac
in aliis causis ipsum concernentem agendum defendendum protestandum Et continualiter
omnia alia et singula faciendum gerendum Promittentem de Rato et grato in
vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said day the videw of vmquhile thomas leiche grantit to freitht
and releive Johnne' auchneif of the maile awand be hir to patrik
andersoun' for the quhilk scho drew him souerte to the said patrike

The xxiiij day of marche the yer' forsaid' Williame scrimgeour sergeand' at command'
of thomaz leslie ane of the balyeis of Abirdene arretit tene crovnis
of money in the handis of malcome crag et Williame Watsone pertening
to lang Wat nichtbour of the said' burghe duelland' on monecabaok except'
xxviij s' quhilkis gilbert menyes sulde haue of the saide Some

The saide day Mage moir' was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
Ricahrd' Waus forspekar for trubulance of made Wricht for the
quhilk scho was in Ane amerciament of the court et cetera And' atour it was
deliuirit be the saide assis' and euire scho trubull the said' mage
Wricht in tym' to Cum and beis conuict' tharof' scho salbe expellit this
tone

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo septimo
die mensis marcij Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo Tercio

This saide day Comperit Alexnadro thomsone litstar with Duncan colly
soun' his forspekar ande offerit hyme reddy tile ansuer to the borgh'
fundin one him be gilbert last' contenit in this buk obefor ande til vnderly
ane decisioun' of ane assis' vnsuspek ofe the bext and wortiast of the
saide burgh' ande of his Erast Ande thar eftir William scrimgeoure at
command of the baillies callit the said gilbert diuers' to cum and follow the
said borgh' be him self or be his procuratouris quhilk gilbert beand
oftymes callit and nocht comperit the said Duncan forspekar to the said alexander
prostesit for Remede of lawe

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
octauo die mensis marcij Anno quosupra

The said' day Alexander chamer producit ane lettir of our Soueran
lordis vndir the Signet of the deliuirance of the lordis of
consal chargeand' the aldirman and balyeis to caus' him to
haue the gudis takis and landis pertening to thomas chamer his
brothir sone of ayrschipe throw the decess' of vmquhile William
chavmir Eme to the said' thomas as in the samyn mair' fullely
Is contenit and quhilkis be opinlie rede the said' Alexander prostet quhat
takis or stedingis that happinnes the margaret of Kintor the
Relict of the said' Williame till Occupy or Intromett' with pertening
to the said' thomas as ayr' to the saide vmquhile sulde turne
him to nay preiudice

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem tercio die Aprilis Anno quo supra

The said' day It was appontit betuix gilbert litstar one that
ane prt Ande alexander thomsone litstar one that vthir part one this
wys' that is to say / ale process' ande persecucioun' of Justice
sal ces' in ale debatis debatabill betuix thame vnto the
tyme mastir Dauid guthre prouest of that Ilk / cum hame
Ande thane thai ar' content to stande and abid' at the
ordinance and / deliuerance of the said mastir Dauy sere Johne
Stirueling James Colisone and Johne of Retre or ony vthiris
that it ples' the said mastir Dauy to tak to him Anent the
debatis and clamys quhatsumeuire debatabile betuix the said partiis
